verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, earnestly \w beholding|strong="G0816"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* have \w lived|strong="G4176"\w* in \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* before \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2004"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* stood \w by|strong="G3936"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w smite|strong="G5180"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* on the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* \w smite|strong="G5180"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \add thou\add* \w whited|strong="G2867"\w* \w wall|strong="G5109"\w*: \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w sittest|strong="G2521"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* to \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w commandest|strong="G2753"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* to be \w smitten|strong="G5180"\w* contrary to the \w law|strong="G3891"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w that|strong="G3588"\w* stood \w by|strong="G3936"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Revilest \w thou|strong="G3058"\w* \w God’s|strong="G2316"\w* high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G5037"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, I \w wist|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G2046"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w speak|strong="G2046"\w* \w evil|strong="G2560"\w* of the \w ruler|strong="G0758"\w* of \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w perceived|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w* \w were|strong="G2076"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, he cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* a \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w*, the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of a \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w*: \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* am called in \w question|strong="G2919"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5124"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* had so \w said|strong="G2980"\w*, there \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* a \w dissension|strong="G4714"\w* between the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* was \w divided|strong="G4977"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w* say \w that|strong="G3004"\w* there \w is|strong="G1511"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w both|strong="G0297"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w cry|strong="G2906"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \add that were\add* of the \w Pharisees’|strong="G5330"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w* \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*, and \w strove|strong="G1264"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, We \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, let \w us|strong="G2313"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* fight against \w God|strong="G2313"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when there \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w dissension|strong="G4714"\w*, the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w*, \w fearing|strong="G2125"\w* \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* should have been pulled in \w pieces|strong="G1288"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4753"\w* to go \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, and to \w take|strong="G0726"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* by \w force|strong="G0726"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w among|strong="G3319"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* to \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \add him\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w castle|strong="G3925"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w following|strong="G1966"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w stood|strong="G2186"\w* by \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Be of good cheer|strong="G2293"\+w*, \+w Paul|strong="G3972"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* thou \+w hast testified|strong="G1263"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w*, \+w so|strong="G3779"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w bear witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Rome|strong="G4516"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when it \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w banded|strong="G4160"\w* \w together|strong="G4963"\w*, and \w bound|strong="G0332"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* under a \w curse|strong="G0332"\w*, saying \w that|strong="G3004"\w* they \w would|strong="G5315"\w* \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w till|strong="G2193"\w* they had \w killed|strong="G0615"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* than \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* had \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="G4945"\w*.

And \w they|strong="G3748"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* to the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, We have \w bound|strong="G0332"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* under a great \w curse|strong="G0331"\w*, that we will \w eat|strong="G1089"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* we have \w slain|strong="G0615"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G3568"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w* \w signify|strong="G1718"\w* to the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w that|strong="G3704"\w* he \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* to \w morrow|strong="G0839"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* ye \w would|strong="G3195"\w* \w enquire|strong="G1231"\w* something more \w perfectly|strong="G0199"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*, or \w ever|strong="G4253"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* come \w near|strong="G1448"\w*, \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* to \w kill|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul’s|strong="G3972"\w* \w sister’s|strong="G0079"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* of their lying in \w wait|strong="G1749"\w*, he \w went|strong="G3854"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w castle|strong="G3925"\w*, and \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the \w centurions|strong="G1543"\w* unto \add him\add*, and \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Bring|strong="G0520"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* young \w man|strong="G3494"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* a certain \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* to \w tell|strong="G0518"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* he \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \add him\add* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* the \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w unto|strong="G4341"\w* \add him\add*, and prayed \w me|strong="G2065"\w* to \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* young \w man|strong="G3494"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, who \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w something|strong="G5100"\w* to \w say|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* by the \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G0402"\w* \add with him\add* \w aside|strong="G2596"\w* \w privately|strong="G2398"\w*, and \w asked|strong="G4441"\w* \add him\add*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w hast|strong="G2192"\w* to \w tell|strong="G0518"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, The \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* have \w agreed|strong="G4934"\w* to \w desire|strong="G2065"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w that|strong="G3704"\w* thou wouldest bring \w down|strong="G2609"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* to \w morrow|strong="G0839"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* they would \w enquire|strong="G4441"\w* \w somewhat|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w more|strong="G3195"\w* \w perfectly|strong="G0199"\w*.

\w But|strong="G3767"\w* \w do|strong="G3982"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w yield|strong="G3982"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* there lie in \w wait|strong="G1748"\w* for \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* than \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* have \w bound|strong="G0332"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* with an \w oath|strong="G0332"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* they \w will|strong="G5315"\w* \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w till|strong="G2193"\w* they have \w killed|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* are \w they|strong="G1526"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w*, looking \w for|strong="G4327"\w* a \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \add then\add* \w let|strong="G0630"\w* the young \w man|strong="G3494"\w* \w depart|strong="G0630"\w*, and \w charged|strong="G3853"\w* \add him, See thou\add* \w tell|strong="G1583"\w* no \w man|strong="G3367"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou hast \w shewed|strong="G1718"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G5100"\w* \w called|strong="G4341"\w* unto \add him\add* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w centurions|strong="G1543"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, Make \w ready|strong="G2090"\w* two \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w to|strong="G3704"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w horsemen|strong="G2460"\w* threescore and \w ten|strong="G1440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spearmen|strong="G1187"\w* two \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w*, \w at|strong="G0575"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* of the \w night|strong="G3571"\w*;

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w provide|strong="G3936"\w* \add them\add* \w beasts|strong="G2934"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w set|strong="G1913"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w on|strong="G1913"\w*, and \w bring|strong="G1295"\w* \add him\add* \w safe|strong="G1295"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*.
And he \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* a \w letter|strong="G1992"\w* \w after|strong="G4023"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w manner|strong="G5179"\w*:

\w Claudius|strong="G2804"\w* \w Lysias|strong="G3079"\w* unto the most \w excellent|strong="G2903"\w* \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* \add sendeth\add* \w greeting|strong="G5463"\w*.

\w This|strong="G5126"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* was \w taken|strong="G4815"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3195"\w* have been \w killed|strong="G0337"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: then came \w I|strong="G2186"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* an \w army|strong="G4753"\w*, and \w rescued|strong="G1807"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, having \w understood|strong="G3129"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w* a \w Roman|strong="G4514"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when I \w would|strong="G1014"\w* have \w known|strong="G1097"\w* the \w cause|strong="G0156"\w* \w wherefore|strong="G3739"\w* they \w accused|strong="G1458"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, I \w brought|strong="G2609"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w forth|strong="G2609"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w council|strong="G4892"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* I \w perceived|strong="G2147"\w* to be \w accused|strong="G1458"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w questions|strong="G2213"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* to \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* laid to his \w charge|strong="G1462"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* of \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when it was \w told|strong="G3377"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w how|strong="G5259"\w* \w that|strong="G2071"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* laid \w wait|strong="G1917"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, I \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w straightway|strong="G1824"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, and gave \w commandment|strong="G3853"\w* to his \w accusers|strong="G2725"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \add they had\add* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w Farewell|strong="G4517"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*, \w as|strong="G2596"\w* it was \w commanded|strong="G1299"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w took|strong="G0353"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, and \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \add him\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antipatris|strong="G0494"\w*.

\w On|strong="G1161"\w* the \w morrow|strong="G1887"\w* they \w left|strong="G1439"\w* the \w horsemen|strong="G2460"\w* to \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w castle|strong="G3925"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w*, when they \w came|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w delivered|strong="G0325"\w* the \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w* to the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*, \w presented|strong="G3936"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* before \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* had \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \add the letter\add*, he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w province|strong="G1885"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w understood|strong="G4441"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \add he was\add* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Cilicia|strong="G2791"\w*;

I will \w hear|strong="G1251"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, said \w he|strong="G5346"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w accusers|strong="G2725"\w* are \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G3854"\w*. \w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to be \w kept|strong="G5442"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Herod’s|strong="G2264"\w* judgment \w hall|strong="G4232"\w*.
